id.title: mojo.core.String
id.description: the id of the edge, will be generated from the node names

implicit.title: mojo.core.Bool
implicit.description:
Whether the Decl represents something directly written in source or
it was implicitly generated by the type-checker.

inverse.title: mojo.core.Bool
inverse.description: indicate the reference or the back reference

referenceByKey.title: mojo.core.Bool
referenceByKey.description: reference to entity by the key field (or id field), but not by the type pointer
